client.models

Class Turn

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.models.Turn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITurn

    public class Turn
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITurn
    The Turn class keeps track of who the current player is and the number rolled on the dice. It also initiates playing a card, a trade, building a road or settlement.
    Author:
    scottdaly
